span.style: font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: medium; color: #ffffff;
font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: medium; color: #ffffff;
span.span: The next Board of Education meeting will be on April 7, 2020, at 6:30 pm.

span.style: font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: medium; color: #ffffff;
span.span: This meeting WILL NOT HAVE PAPER AGENDAS.

span.style: font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: medium; color: #ffffff;
span.span: You can review the agenda on our web page as it gets closer to the date and the public can utilize our WI FI to view it electronically during the meeting.

span.style: font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: medium; color: #ffffff;
span.span: This meeting will be held virtually using a Zoom platform by clicking ‘electronic board meeting’ below. There will be no physical location for this meeting but it is still open to the public to attend.

span.img: Park Technology Services is a component of Somerdale School District. Being affiliated with a school we understand the budget constraints faced by schools and government agencies. We believe technology can be an effective tool to increase productivity, efficiency, and work place culture. The mission of Park Technology Services (PTS) is to provide schools, municipalities, and government agencies with solutions using the latest technology and industry standard techniques that will fit their growing technology needs and improve efficiency. We are committed to customer service and our support team will strive to help your company move into the future.

p.strong: Like all school districts in the state of New Jersey, under the directive of Gov. Murphy, the Somerdale School District is closed until further notice. We will continue sending daily email updates to our community and posting updates on this website and on social media.
Email addresses for Administration employees and staff members are available on the www.somerdale-park.org website, under the Contacts Tab and then Staff Directory tab
Thank you for your continued patience and support.

div.p: For all communications and information regarding Somerdale Park School and the Coronavirus, please visit our Coronavirus Communications Page by Clicking Here.
